verbose_text: To do so, we measured MCB-detectable GSH pools in KEAP1 KO, NAA38 KO1/2, and MRP1 KO1/2 cells treated with vehicle (DMSO) or erastin2 (5 muM) for 12 h. KEAP1 KO and NAA38 KO1/2 cells exhibited a basal increase in intracellular MCB-detectable GSH levels relative to control cells, but MCB-detectable GSH was depleted to a similar extent in these mutants relative to their respective controls following 12 h of erastin2 treatment (XREF_FIG).
